extendedInfo.description: Slice HD is a sinister puzzle game for your Android device. The goal of the game is to clear layers of very sharp blades to push the red button. Push all the buttons in order and you win. While trying to open the puzzle you must not touch the sharp edges of the blades or you will get SLICED. When this happens, blood spills from your finger(s) onto the glass and the puzzle will reset. The blades only move in specific patterns that you must intuit by touch. Often, you must use multiple fingers to hold blades open while you manipulate other blades with other fingers. This game is really about trying to figure out the hidden behaviours of the blades and moving the blades out of the way, carefully.Great party game and a GREAT tablet game!  Supports Google Play Services with leader boards and achievements.First 12 levels are free.The additional level packs are purchasable.

reviews.title: One of the best games out there!
Idiots
reviews.comment: \"First 12 levels are free.\" All those complaining are idiots.
reviews.author: Yanellis Bonano

reviews.title: To all you idiots who think this is a free hame
reviews.comment: It clearly states that the first 12 levels are free. Stop whining cuz you didn\'t read the description thoroughly.
reviews.author: Patrick Power

reviews.title: Not free. Sell Pro version on Google Play
reviews.comment: Dont advertise a game as free when its NOT.  This is nothing more than a short free trial.  Advertise it as a trial and sell a pro version on Google Play.  Uninstalling and 1 star.
reviews.author: Jo A.

reviews.title: Don\'t offer free game and only have 20 levels
reviews.comment: I just got the game 10 mins ago and have literally gone thru the entire game. Then got prompted to buy more levels. Why don\'t you charge for the game and provide a better one? I\'m going to uninstall now
reviews.author: Tanya Lavrenov

reviews.title: I would like a refund on the 24 bonus levels I \'\'bought\'\'
reviews.comment: I acedentally tapped ,pay 1.00 so it omfirmed payment, I looked everywhere for a refund choice but you did not have one, now my dad is go in to yell at me for buying it, if ya\'ll just put a refund on it I would not have this trouble so I strongly request you give me my money back
reviews.author: Kora Jo

reviews.title: Simple game.
reviews.comment: Too easy. Only takes 5 minutes to do the free levels, why would I pay extra to play for just 10 more minutes?
reviews.author: Tony Brown

reviews.title: Did you not read the game summary before downloading the game?
reviews.comment: It clearly says in the summary, that the game has twelve free levels...more levels for purchase. I think this game is entertaining. It may be short, but there is a time clock for a reason...I just keep trying to improve my time. First time I played, I did it in 4 mins...now I am under a minute...going to buy more puzzles, c\'mon, its only a dollar...
reviews.author: Nicholas Cook

reviews.title: Have you read Running.Man?
reviews.comment: We as a society are funked in the head. This game is evidence of that. Obsession with blood and violence is taking us down an ugly road..
reviews.author: Jenny Barron

reviews.title: Stinks
reviews.comment: Has like 5 levels and then bam o you cant play anymore gotta pay.
reviews.author: glenn marble

reviews.title: Great concept.
reviews.comment: Please, more free levels! I might actually buy some if I got a chance to really play in the first place.
reviews.author: Michael Howell

reviews.title: Fun game.
reviews.comment: Game is a fun way to pass the time and not be bored out of your mind... and it does state that \" first 12 levels are free\".
reviews.author: Tristan Pittenger

reviews.title: Okay puzzle game
reviews.comment: Only has 10 levels then asks you to buy more levels. The game was not good enough for me to spend money. Sorry.
reviews.author: Reese Vinniane

reviews.title: Good game!
reviews.comment: 5 stars! States clearly first 12 levels are free. Don\'t vote 1 star because you can\'t read.
reviews.author: Robert Spizzirri

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: For those who didnt read the discription it clearly states \"FIRST 12 LEVELS ARE FREE\" Other than that its a GREAT GAME 5*****
reviews.author: Martin Georgari

reviews.title: Waste of time unless you buy apps
reviews.comment: It only takes like ten minutes to go through all the\'\'free\'\' levels.
reviews.author: Zayne Lanier

reviews.title: Level 9
reviews.comment: I\'ve pushed the red button on level 9 about 15 times now, but it won\'t let me move on. I won\'t be bothering to buy it since it won\'t even let you play through the free trial.
reviews.author: Amy Harris

reviews.title: No option for 0 stars
reviews.comment: Very easy I beat the free levels in 4 min 39 seconds and I redid a few its not worth the data
reviews.author: Aaron Phillips

reviews.title: Fix plz
reviews.comment: Downloaded it 3 times and tells me \'package file is not valid\'
reviews.author: Steven Kubyako
